Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS2566.2 & TNZ F2
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point - Compacted material recorded via clegg testing - tests must pass to continue with backfill
4.1.1 - Production Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse. (1)
Accept / Reject Criteria - TNZ M/4: Cl.4.2.3
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - PSD Wet Sieving Test
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - TNZ M/4:2006, NZS 4407 :1991 Test 3.8.1
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
4.1.1 - Production Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse. (2)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Aggregate broken face content in each of the three aggregate fractions between 37.5mm and 4.75mm ≥ 70% by weight and has 2 or more broken faces
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Broken Face Test
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - TNZ M/4: 2006, NZS 4407 :1991 Test 3.14
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
4.1.1 - Production Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse. (3)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Sand equivalent > 40, NB Downer Policy that only SE compliant basecourse allowed unless stabilised
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Sand equivalent test 1
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - TNZ M/4: 2006, NZS 4407 :1991 Test 3.6
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
4.1.1 - Production Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse. (4)
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Plasticity Index Test
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - TNZ M/4: 2006, NZS 4407:1991 Test 3.4
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
Accept / Reject Criteria - OWC as determined in the lab.
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - NZ vibrating hammer compaction test at OWC The lesser of:
a) 1 test per stockpile or new seam
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4407:1991 Solid Density Test 3.7 TNZ B/2: 2005
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All lab testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
Accept / Reject Criteria - When sampling stockpile for lab, take NDM for W/C offset. Record moisture content and take sample from beneath NDM to dry in the oven. (Two W/C readings and samples)
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Solid density
a) 1 test per stockpile or new seam
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4407:1991 W/C Test 3.7 TNZ B/2: 2005
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All lab testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
Accept / Reject Criteria - MDD as the higher of the two results from lab and field
○ Ensure plateau test is done at OWC from Lab Value and with NDM moisture offset
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - MDD at OWC – in lab
a) 1 test per stockpile or new seam
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4402: 1986 MDD and W/C Test 4.1.3 TNZ B/2: 2005
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All lab testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road
4.1.3 - Source Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse (1)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Crushing resistance must reach 130 kN with less than 10% fines passing 2.36mm sieve
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - TNZ M/4 Crushing Resistance Test
○ 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - TNZ M/4: 2006, NZS 4407 :1991 Test 3.10
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road for a source CHAR(LESS)2 years old
4.1.3 - Source Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse (2)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Crushing resistance must reach 130 kN with less than 10% fines passing 2.36mm sieve

Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - TNZ M/4/NZ vibrating hammer compaction test at OMC/Determination of CBR. 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4402: 1986 Test 4.13/NZS 4407: 1991 Test CBR 3.15/TNZ M/4: 2006
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road for a source CHAR(LESS)2 years old
4.1.3 - Source Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse (3)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Soaked CBR ≥ 80% when compacted/tested in accordance with both tests
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Weathering quality index test
○ 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4407:1991, Test 3.11/TNZ M/4:2006
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road for a source CHAR(LESS)2 years old
4.1.3 - Source Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse (4)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Must have quality index of AA, AB, AC, BA, BB or CA
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - NZTA T15 RLT strain test for rutting performance
○ 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZTA T15
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road for a source CHAR(LESS)2 years old
4.1.3 - Source Properties - Note: Running course to be produced from the same type and source of material as the basecourse (5)
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - NZTA T15 RLT strain test for rutting performance
○ 1 test per 10,000 m3 of source material per source, or when a variation occurs in the rock geology e.g. new seam of rock
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZTA T15
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – All production and source testing results to be provided prior to placement of material on road for a source CHAR(LESS)2 years old
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - NDM – maximum dry density - Backscatter method, 5 tests per homogeneous lot of up to 1000m2 of laid pavement
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4407: 1991 Test 4.2.2. TNZ B/2: 2005
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – no surfacing layer is to be applied until passing results are achieved  (ie average & minimum MDD)
Accept / Reject Criteria - DOS ≤ 80% from Solid Density and %W
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - DOS/5 tests per homogeneous lot of up to 1000m2 of laid pavement
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - NZS 4407: 1991 Test 4.2.2. TNZ B/2: 2005
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – no surfacing layer is to be applied until passing results are achieved  (ie average & minimum MDD)
Accept / Reject Criteria - Slopes consistent with pavement surface
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Visual check
Spec. Ref, Procedure Or Method Statement - Visual inspection with smart level
DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – no surfacing layer is to be applied until all necessary results are achieved
Accept / Reject Criteria - Vehicles can drive on shoulders without significant indentation/soft surface
Frequency Of Inspection Or Test - Visual check/All shoulders

DESCRIPTION - Hold Point – no surfacing layer is to be applied until all necessary results are achieved
